content.rendered:
Online registration for Clark County School District’s (CCSD) 2025-2026 school year is now open. 

Families new to CCSD may begin their registration process online at register.ccsd.net. 

Families with students enrolled at a CCSD school can now complete registration using Campus Parent via Infinite Campus (campus portal.ccsd.net). Please make sure all of your contact information is up-to-date. This includes cell and work phones, home addresses, and emergency contact information.

Parents/Guardians with an Infinite Campus account will see an announcement through Campus Parent with a link connecting them to the 2025-2026 registration page. Families with multiple children will also see the option in certain areas to copy responses from one child to the next to help save time with the registration process. Families can use a computer or a mobile device to complete registration.

Parents/Guardians should note that the 2025-26 school year begins Monday, August 11, 2025. 

Families with students new to CCSD or returning after leaving the District must provide the required documents to the child’s zoned school. 

Documents Required For Registration

  • Parent/Guardian ID
  • Child’s ID – (birth certificate, passport, certified birth card) 
  • Immunization Record
    • Immunization Resources
  • Proof of Address (recent utility bill, rent receipt, residence lease, or sales contract)

Shared Housing

Families can select Shared Housing as an option during online registration if they do not have a lease, mortgage, or utility bill in a parent/guardian’s name to provide proof of address. Families will be directed on where to submit the necessary paperwork to complete the registration process.

Additional Resources

To find out which school a student is zoned to attend, parents/guardians may visit http://dzg.ccsd.net/.

For details regarding registration requirements, parents/guardians may visit register.ccsd.net.
